then, you mustn't forget he was raving jealous of you.
MARG.—Who knows?
CLEM.—What?
CLEM.—I thought I noticed that, too. (Pause.)
MARG.—Good heavens, they were all jealous of you. Nat¬

urally enough—you were so unlike them. They all paid court
